ygData.subject: Charging for combines
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I agree.  Quite frankly, I ve stopped answering /shouts /oocs /etc s for someone asking to get something combined unless they re offering the money in
ygData.messageBody:
> Unless they were a guildmate then yes, I would charge them - I spent a lot of
> time, effort and money getting my tinkering skill to where it is, and people
> like this hypothetical person you mention who wan't the quick reward with none
> of the effort annoy me. No, I'm not charging them for the 30sec combine, I'm
> charging them for the hours I spent combining items over and over to get a skill
> increase.

I agree. Quite frankly, I've stopped answering /shouts /oocs /etc's for someone
asking to get something combined unless they're offering the money in their
original request. There are just to many people wanting handouts, and it has begun
to annoy me. I do however still bind for free. Different issue in my opinion.
